methods.name: AutomationDir
methods.doc: Returns the directory for automation save files

methods.name: AutomationLogDir
methods.doc: Returns the directory for automation log files

methods.name: AutomationTransientDir
methods.doc: Returns the directory for automation save files that are meant to be deleted every run

methods.name: BugItDir
methods.doc:
Returns the directory the engine uses to output BugIt files.

@return screenshot directory

methods.name: ChangeExtension
methods.doc: Changes the extension of the given filename (does nothing if the file has no extension)

methods.name: CloudDir
methods.doc: Returns the directory for local files used in cloud emulation or support

methods.name: CollapseRelativeDirectories
methods.doc:
Takes a fully pathed string and eliminates relative pathing (eg: annihilates ".." with the adjacent directory).
Assumes all slashes have been converted to TEXT('/').
For example, takes the string:
      BaseDirectory/SomeDirectory/../SomeOtherDirectory/Filename.ext
and converts it to:
      BaseDirectory/SomeOtherDirectory/Filename.ext

methods.name: Combine
methods.doc: Combine two or more Paths into one single Path

methods.name: ConvertFromSandboxPath
methods.doc:
Converts a sandbox (in Saved/Sandboxes) path to a normal path.

@param InSandboxName The name of the sandbox.

methods.name: ConvertRelativePathToFull
methods.doc:
Converts a relative path name to a fully qualified name relative to the specified BasePath.
BasePath will be the process BaseDir() if not BasePath is given

methods.name: ConvertToSandboxPath
methods.doc:
Converts a normal path to a sandbox path (in Saved/Sandboxes).

@param InSandboxName The name of the sandbox.

methods.name: CreateTempFilename
DiffDir
methods.doc: Returns the directory for temp files used for diffing

methods.name: DirectoryExists
methods.doc: Returns true if this directory was found, false otherwise

methods.name: EngineConfigDir
methods.doc:
Returns the directory the root configuration files are located.

@return root config directory

methods.name: EngineContentDir
EngineDir
methods.doc:
Returns the base directory of the "core" engine that can be shared across
several games or across games & mods. Shaders and base localization files
e.g. reside in the engine directory.

@return engine directory

methods.name: EngineIntermediateDir
methods.doc:
Returns the intermediate directory of the engine

@return content directory

methods.name: EnginePluginsDir
methods.doc:
Returns the plugins directory of the engine

@return Plugins directory.

methods.name: EngineSavedDir
methods.doc:
Returns the saved directory of the engine

@return Saved directory.

methods.name: EngineSourceDir
methods.doc: Returns the directory where engine source code files are kept

methods.name: EngineUserDir
methods.doc:
Returns the root directory for user-specific engine files. Always writable.

@return root user directory

methods.name: EngineVersionAgnosticUserDir
methods.doc:
Returns the root directory for user-specific engine files which can be shared between versions. Always writable.

@return root user directory

methods.name: EnterpriseDir
methods.doc:
Returns the base directory enterprise directory.

@return enterprise directory

methods.name: EnterpriseFeaturePackDir
methods.doc:
Returns the enterprise FeaturePack directory

@return FeaturePack directory.

methods.name: EnterprisePluginsDir
methods.doc:
Returns the enterprise plugins directory

@return Plugins directory.

methods.name: FeaturePackDir
methods.doc: Returns the directory where feature packs are kept

methods.name: FileExists
methods.doc: Returns true if this file was found, false otherwise

methods.name: GameAgnosticSavedDir
GameDevelopersDir
methods.doc: Returns the directory that contains subfolders for developer-specific content

methods.name: GameSourceDir
methods.doc: Returns the directory where game source code files are kept

methods.name: GameUserDeveloperDir
methods.doc: Returns the directory that contains developer-specific content for the current user

methods.name: GeneratedConfigDir
methods.doc:
Returns the directory the engine saves generated config files.

@return config directory

methods.name: GetBaseFilename
methods.doc: Returns the same thing as GetCleanFilename, but without the extension

methods.name: GetCleanFilename
methods.doc: Returns the filename (with extension), minus any path information.

methods.name: GetEditorLocalizationPaths
methods.doc: Returns a list of editor-specific localization paths

methods.name: GetEngineLocalizationPaths
methods.doc: Returns a list of engine-specific localization paths

methods.name: GetExtension
GetGameLocalizationPaths
methods.doc: Returns a list of game-specific localization paths

methods.name: GetInvalidFileSystemChars
methods.doc: Returns a string containing all invalid characters as dictated by the operating system

methods.name: GetPath
methods.doc: Returns the path in front of the filename

methods.name: GetProjectFilePath
methods.doc:
Gets the path to the project file.

@return Project file path.

methods.name: GetPropertyNameLocalizationPaths
methods.doc: Returns a list of property name localization paths

methods.name: GetRelativePathToRoot
methods.doc: Gets the relative path to get from BaseDir to RootDirectory

methods.name: GetRestrictedFolderNames
methods.doc: Returns a list of restricted/internal folder names (without any slashes) which may be tested against full paths to determine if a path is restricted or not.

methods.name: GetToolTipLocalizationPaths
methods.doc: Returns a list of tool tip localization paths

methods.name: HasProjectPersistentDownloadDir
methods.doc: * Returns true if a writable directory for downloaded data that persists across play sessions is available

methods.name: IsDrive
methods.doc: Returns true if this path represents a root drive or volume

methods.name: IsProjectFilePathSet
methods.doc:
Checks whether the path to the project file, if any, is set.

@return true if the path is set, false otherwise.

methods.name: IsRelative
methods.doc: Returns true if this path is relative to another path

methods.name: IsRestrictedPath
methods.doc: Determines if supplied path uses a restricted/internal subdirectory.  Note that slashes are normalized and character case is ignored for the comparison.

methods.name: IsSamePath
LaunchDir
methods.doc: Returns the directory the application was launched from (useful for commandline utilities)

methods.name: MakePathRelativeTo
MakePlatformFilename
methods.doc: Takes an "Unreal" pathname and converts it to a platform filename.

methods.name: MakeStandardFilename
methods.doc:
Make fully standard "Unreal" pathname:
   - Normalizes path separators [NormalizeFilename]
   - Removes extraneous separators  [NormalizeDirectoryName, as well removing adjacent separators]
   - Collapses internal ..'s
   - Makes relative to Engine\Binaries\<Platform> (will ALWAYS start with ..\..\..)

methods.name: MakeValidFileName
NormalizeDirectoryName
methods.doc: Normalize all / and \ to TEXT("/") and remove any trailing TEXT("/") if the character before that is not a TEXT("/") or a colon

methods.name: NormalizeFilename
methods.doc: Convert all / and \ to TEXT("/")

methods.name: ProfilingDir
methods.doc:
Returns the directory the engine uses to output profiling files.

@return log directory

methods.name: ProjectConfigDir
methods.doc:
Returns the directory the root configuration files are located.

@return root config directory

methods.name: ProjectContentDir
methods.doc:
Returns the content directory of the current game by looking at FApp::GetProjectName().

@return content directory

methods.name: ProjectDir
methods.doc:
Returns the base directory of the current project by looking at FApp::GetProjectName().
This is usually a subdirectory of the installation
root directory and can be overridden on the command line to allow self
contained mod support.

@return base directory

methods.name: ProjectIntermediateDir
methods.doc:
Returns the intermediate directory of the current game by looking at FApp::GetProjectName().

@return intermediate directory

methods.name: ProjectLogDir
methods.doc:
Returns the directory the engine uses to output logs. This currently can't
be an .ini setting as the game starts logging before it can read from .ini
files.

@return log directory

methods.name: ProjectModsDir
methods.doc:
Returns the mods directory of the current project by looking at FApp::GetProjectName().

@return mods directory

methods.name: ProjectPersistentDownloadDir
methods.doc: * Returns the writable directory for downloaded data that persists across play sessions.

methods.name: ProjectPluginsDir
methods.doc:
Returns the plugins directory of the current game by looking at FApp::GetProjectName().

@return plugins directory

methods.name: ProjectSavedDir
methods.doc:
Returns the saved directory of the current game by looking at FApp::GetProjectName().

@return saved directory

methods.name: ProjectUserDir
methods.doc:
Returns the root directory for user-specific game files.

@return game user directory

methods.name: RemoveDuplicateSlashes
methods.doc:
Removes duplicate slashes in paths.
Assumes all slashes have been converted to TEXT('/').
For example, takes the string:
      BaseDirectory/SomeDirectory//SomeOtherDirectory////Filename.ext
and converts it to:
      BaseDirectory/SomeDirectory/SomeOtherDirectory/Filename.ext

methods.name: RootDir
methods.doc:
Returns the root directory of the engine directory tree

@return Root directory.

methods.name: SandboxesDir
methods.doc:
Returns the directory the engine stores sandbox output

@return sandbox directory

methods.name: ScreenShotDir
methods.doc:
Returns the directory the engine uses to output screenshot files.

@return screenshot directory

methods.name: SetExtension
methods.doc: Sets the extension of the given filename (like ChangeExtension, but also applies the extension if the file doesn't have one)

methods.name: SetProjectFilePath
methods.doc:
Sets the path to the project file.

@param NewGameProjectFilePath - The project file path to set.

methods.name: ShaderWorkingDir
methods.doc:
Returns the Shader Working Directory

@return shader working directory

methods.name: ShouldSaveToUserDir
methods.doc: Should the "saved" directory structures be rooted in the user dir or relative to the "engine/game"

methods.name: SourceConfigDir
Split
ValidatePath
VideoCaptureDir
methods.doc:
Returns the directory the engine uses to output user requested video capture files.

@return Video capture directory
